name: Absorb The Orb
description:
Each level is a set of colored orbs(balls) connected to each other.
The main goal is to absorb these orbs, but absorbing of one orb may impact other orbs according to the following basic rules:
- Absorbed orb absorbs all other connected to it orbs that have the same color
- Absorbed orb recolors to its own color all other connected to it orbs that have different color

The challenge is to collect as long chains of absorbed orbs as possible until there are no orbs left on the level.
The longer the chain of orbs you absorb in one turn - the more score you get.

Over time, different types of orbs appear in the game, each with its own unique behavior.
For example, there will be orbs that change their color periodically.

Game uses rank system:
- Each rank contains a set of new levels
- Some ranks also unlock access to new features of the gameplay
- Complete all levels of the current rank with three Stars in order to get new rank
- It is not possible to return to levels of previous ranks, however this does not make sense

Besides the usual levels, game has Premium Levels that you can buy using free in-game currency (like Stars and others).
In-game currency is earned by completing levels in PLAY mode.

Game has free main part with a big set of ranks and levels.
But if this is not enough for you, then you can buy a VIP, which will open access to an unlimited number of levels for the PLAY mode.
VIP also gives +1 bonus to all earned items.
